title: Virtual Reality-Based Mechanical Tool Process Simulation Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mechanical engineering theories, experience with CAD software, and understanding of mathematical modeling concepts
context.additional_context: A practice-centered educational environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD). Integrates VR simulation tools (VIRTOOL-based) and 3D modeling software.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the operating principles of mechanical tools in a 3D simulation within a virtual reality environment.
Using simulation tools, learners can mathematically model and optimize process parameters (speed, angle, load, etc.) of machine tools.
Through team projects, learners can design industry-applicable process simulations and write verification reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
